uniol.apt.ui

Interface ReturnValuesTransformer

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    AptReturnValuesTransformer, ReturnValuesTransformerImpl

    public interface ReturnValuesTransformer
    This is just the reverse of ParametersTransformer.
    Author:
    Renke Grunwald

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      <T> ReturnValueTransformation<T> getTransformation(java.lang.Class<T> klass)
      Returns an object that transforms objects of type T to strings.

      Transforms the given argument to a string and appends it to the given writer.

        <T> ReturnValueTransformation<T> getTransformation(java.lang.Class<T> klass)
        Returns an object that transforms objects of type T to strings.

        T - source type that will be transformed to a string

      • transform

        <T> void transform(java.io.Writer output,
                   java.lang.Object arg,
                   java.lang.Class<T> klass)
            throws ModuleException,
                   java.io.IOException
        Transforms the given argument to a string and appends it to the given writer.
        Type Parameters:
        T - source type that will be transformed to a string
        Parameters:
        output - writer
        arg - argument of class klass
        klass - type of given argument
        Throws:
        ModuleException - thrown when the transformation fails
        java.io.IOException - thrown when the append to the writer fails

      • transform

        <T> void transform(java.io.Writer output,
                   java.lang.Object arg,
                   java.lang.Class<T> klass,
                   java.lang.String extraOptions)
            throws ModuleException,
                   java.io.IOException
        Transforms the given argument to a string and appends it to the given writer.
        Type Parameters:
        T - source type that will be transformed to a string
        Parameters:
        output - writer
        arg - argument of class klass
        klass - type of given argument
        extraOptions - extra options given to the transformation
        Throws:
        ModuleException - thrown when the transformation fails
        java.io.IOException - thrown when the append to the writer fails
